## Observable.notifyObserver() method

Notify a specific observer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
notifyObserver(observer: Observer<T>, eventData: T, mask?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  observer | <code>Observer&lt;T&gt;</code> | defines the observer to notify |
|  eventData | <code>T</code> | defines the data to be sent to each callback |
|  mask | <code>number</code> | is used to filter observers defaults to -1 |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
